sentences: Ma olen kindel, et see jääks mulle meelde
Ta ütles, et see ei jääks kauaks saladuses
Kui see jääks avalikuks, siis on meil suured probleemid
context: The word jääks is the third person singular form of the verb jääma, which means to remain or to stay in Estonian. It is commonly used in sentences to express that something will continue to be in a certain state or condition.
